turningTypes.name: Fourth Turning (Crisis)
turningTypes.description: A decisive era of upheaval when institutional life is destroyed and rebuilt in response to a perceived threat to the nation's survival.

turningTypes.name: Third Turning (Unraveling)
turningTypes.description: A downcast era of strengthening individualism and weakening institutions, when the old civic order decays and the new values regime implants.

turningTypes.name: Second Turning (Awakening)
turningTypes.description: A passionate era of spiritual upheaval, when the civic order comes under attack from a new values regime.

turningTypes.name: First Turning (High)
turningTypes.description: An upbeat era of strengthening institutions and weakening individualism, when a new civic order implants and the old values regime decays.
